flow.display_value: On board a new Meetup organizer
On board a new Meetup organizer

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi 3.3.1➛User Record➛First name,

I want to officially welcome you to the ServiceNow Developer Meetup Organizer group! Please see the Developer Meetup Organizer guide for tips and tricks on how to get started. You will also receive a separate email from Andrew Barnes which will explain the process of creating your chapter’s Meetup page.

Once you set a date for your first Meetup, I will reach out to you and if you want we can help you create buzz about your event by sending out a promotional email to the developers in your area.

Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions or with feedback on how I can best support you. I look forward to working with you!

Best,

3.1➛Admin Task Record➛Assignment group➛Default assignee➛Name

3.1➛Admin Task Record➛Assignment group➛Default assignee➛Title

servicenow

Best,

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi 3.3➛User Record➛First name,

I want to officially welcome you to the ServiceNow Developer Meetup Organizer group! Please see the Developer Meetup Organizer guide for tips and tricks on how to get started. 

Once you set a date for your first Meetup, I will reach out to you and if you want we can help you create a buzz about your event by sending out a promotional email to the developers in your area.

Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions or with feedback on how I can best support you. I look forward to working with you!

Best,

3.1➛Admin Task Record➛Assignment group➛Default assignee➛Name
